name: resabs1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)), wss(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2))
-| wss(c2, c1)
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2))
-| wss(c2, c1)
-| wi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c2))
-| wss(c2, c1)

comment: Absorption law for restriction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
